movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: OMG
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer programmer discovers a mysterious world beneath the digital reality that he thought he knew.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.synopsis: A group of people must survive a deadly island inhabited by dinosaurs.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.synopsis: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
